title: Wisteria

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- You may choose one person during the day to lock in your Garden for the night, granting them Basic Defense.
- You may choose to execute your captive at night except Night 1.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may anonymously talk with your captive at night.
- You may not lock the same person twice in a row.
- You may only execute twice.
- If you execute a Florae member you will forfeit all executions.

fields.name: Notifications:
fields.value:
"You have decided to capture (player)."
"You have locked away your target!"
"You have (#) executions left."
"You have decided to execute (player)."
"You have changed your mind."
"Your target's defense was too strong to execute."
"Your target was killed by other means, so you did not execute tonight."

"You were locked away in the Garden!"
"Wisteria has decided to execute you."
"Wisteria has changed their mind."
"You were executed by Wisteria!"
"They were executed by Wisteria."

desc:
Post 157
*You are a dedicated landscaper who drags people into their garden.*
